Posts.EditableText:
The original 5 star game has been expanded, improved and debugged thoroughly.  

Can you get Woo off the planet and find the murderer of Doctor Black?

Why not give it a (long) shot?

Posts.EditableText: I have played and finished the game.  The work and improvements that have gone into this game are simply  fantastic.  This is by far one of the best gams I have played in some time.  Beautiful story line that really keeps you involved.  The games uses a few unique  ideas and  tricks that I have not seem in other text adventure games.  And the authors are there to help you out when you get in a Bind.   Thank for all of the extra help and the tremendous effort you put into making this a really great game.
Posts.HTML: I have played and finished the game. The work and improvements that have gone into this game are simply fantastic. This is by far one of the best gams I have played in some time. Beautiful story line that really keeps you involved. The games uses a few unique ideas and tricks that I have not seem in other text adventure games. And the authors are there to help you out when you get in a Bind. Thank for all of the extra help and the tremendous effort you put into making this a really great game.
